segments.text: Do you have any experience working with a computer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I have been a data entry operator for three years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of software can you use ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have working knowledge of Windows and Dos.Actually , I'm quite familiar with both Java and C Programming Languages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any other computer qualifications ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have an ACRE certificate , GRADE 2 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know how to use a PC to process the management information ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry to say I'm not familiar with processing management information , but I'm sure I could learn quite quickly.It can't be too difficult , and I've got a quick mind . I can handle any problem you give me .
segments.speaker: S2
